description: This file implements authentication services for a backend application, including password hashing, JWT token creation and decoding, and user authentication dependencies using FastAPI.

classes.name: User
classes.description: User model class imported from src.models.user

methods.name: str get_password_hash(password: str)
methods.description: Hashes a plaintext password using bcrypt

methods.name: bool verify_password(plain_password: str, hashed_password: str)
methods.description: Verifies if a plaintext password matches a hashed password

methods.name: str _create_token( subject: str, *, expires_minutes: int, token_type: str, cfg: Optional[Settings] = None, extra_claims: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None, )
methods.description: Creates a JWT token with specified claims and expiration

methods.name: str create_access_token(subject: str, *, cfg: Optional[Settings] = None, extra_claims: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None)
methods.description: Generates a short-lived access token for a user

methods.name: str create_refresh_token(subject: str, *, cfg: Optional[Settings] = None, extra_claims: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None)
methods.description: Generates a long-lived refresh token for a user

methods.name: Tuple[str,str] create_token_pair_for_user(user: User, *, cfg: Optional[Settings] = None)
methods.description: Creates a pair of access and refresh tokens for a given user

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] decode_token(token: str, *, cfg: Optional[Settings] = None)
methods.description: Decodes and validates a JWT token

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] get_token_payload(token: str, *, expected_type: Optional[str] = None, cfg: Optional[Settings] = None)
methods.description: Decodes a token and optionally checks its type

methods.name: User get_current_user( token: str = Depends(oauth2_scheme), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
methods.description: FastAPI dependency that retrieves the current authenticated user from the token
